Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to excellence designed to elevate your experience. Given its exceptional features and craftsmanship, we believe it's worth more than its face value. I am extending this opportunity to you at an introductory price of $150. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this investment in enhancing your life or work. If you have any questions or need further information, please let me know. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
